ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: 3 or 4 sounds great. BIC: Perplex counted CR Chambers and knew there were some open, so he placed the injured bot in one. Technosis: Perplex, that

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

OOC: 3 or 4 sounds great.

BIC: Perplex counted CR Chambers and knew there were some open, so he placed
the injured bot in one.

Technosis: Perplex, that guy...he's not what you think, he's an old
Predacon!

Perplex: What's wrong with Predacons? Aren't you a Predacon?

Technosis: I only became a Predacon to get away from Deemos, though!

Perplex: Just because someone's a Predacon is no reason to talk like that.
Predacons deserve to live, too.

Technosis: He's not like us, he's going to want to kill me!

Perplex: Now what makes you say that?

Technosis: Well, he was mad at me last time we spoke over commlink, and I
wished death to him.

Perplex: I doubt the guy would be able to kill you, and look, he's in OUR
base, he can't do a thing!

Technosis: My life is resting on this. I don't care about me, but if I die,
Deemos benefits from it. I don't want Deemos to get this power back.

Perplex: What is the power?

Technosis: I'm not sure, he never mentioned it before.

(Please note, people, that the power will be nothing moding)

Perplex: Don't worry, I won't let anything bad happen to you.

Technosis: But can I trust you?

Perplex: ...Uhh...Where's Zeni?

Technosis: Isn't he with your grandpa?

Perplex: That's what I thought, why don't you go check?

Technosis: Okay.

Technosis left to go to the room. She seen Trinity on the way to the room,
but she was asleep. (Where's Logo, I don't know what to do with Trinity!)
She opened the door. Gramps was staring at her, smiling and holding
something.

Technosis: I just came in here to check. Where's Zeni?

Gramps: He left.

Technosis: What?

Gramps: Yes, he should be somewhere around though.

Technosis: What is that?

Gramps held up his hand. He was holding a gun.

Technosis: I thought Perplex said you hated weapons?

Gramps: He doesn't know anything. I need to carry a weapon...for my job.

Technosis: Job?

Gramps: yes, the one insuring...something for my employer.

Technosis: Who is your employer?

Gramps: He'll come here in the future...he'll kill all of you.

Technosis: What? Who are you!?

Gramps: Just an old guy trying to make a living, sweetheart, heheh. I have a
homing device in this ship, and now he knows exactly where you are!

Technosis: How could you do this?

Gramps: I have my reasons. What are you going to do? Haha! Kill me
perhaps?...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 6:43 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix, the saga continues!...
